argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | eqeq2d.1 | |- ( ph -> A = B ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqeq2 | |- ( A = B -> ( C = A <-> C = B ) ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( C = A <-> C = B ) ) |
